Logical-operators_key1: Logical operators are used to combine two or more conditions.
Logical-operators_key7: && is known as AND operator.  It checks that two conditions are true then it returns true otherwise returns false
Logical-operators_key8: is known as OR operator.  It checks that two conditions and at least 1 condition is true it returns true otherwise returns false
Logical-operators_key9: ! is known as NOT operator. It reverses the boolean result of the operand (or condition)
